topic: PhD position at EPFL in the field of visual comfort
body:
Dear colleagues and friends,


I wanted to inform you of a new position opening for a doctoral 
assistant (PhD) in the field of visual comfort in our group, with a 
submission deadline on November 7th, 2014.


More information on the position can be found here: 
http://lipid.epfl.ch/page-112394-en.html . Please feel free to forward 
this email to your former master students you think may be interested.


More information about our activities can be found at: http://lipid.epfl.ch.


Best regards,


Jan


p.s.: I apologize in case you get this message several times because of 
cross posting.




Dr.-Ing.  Jan Wienold
Ecole Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne (EPFL)
EPFL ENAC IA LIPID


http://people.epfl.ch/jan.wienold
LE 1 113 (Office)
Phone    +41 21 69 38041
